Interests

Apart from being a web developer, I enjoy most of my time being outdoors. In the winter, I am an avid snowboarder. During the warmer months here in Utah, I enjoy mountain biking, hiking, and wake surfing.

When forced indoors, I follow a number of sci-fi and fantasy genre movies and television shows, and I spend a large amount of my free time reading, playing instruments, and exploring the latest technology advancements in the development world.
